title: Courgette Lasagne with smoked salmon
directions: Cut the zucchini slices in the same length as the lasagna blades. Steam the zucchini in a steam bowl or sieve in about 5 minutes.
Mix the cream cheese with the cream, garlic, oregano, 2 tablespoons of olive oil and a lot of salt and pepper.

Place the lasagna sheets in the oven dish and cover with a little olive oil. Sprinkle with some of the cream cheese mixture, then sow with salmon and dill and then a layer of zucchini slices. Put a layer of lasagne sheets over again and repeat the layers until all the ingredients are on.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and bake the courgette lasagne for 20-25 minutes in the oven.
